mapper.select: select u.*, g.group_name , t.team_name,f.field_name from fuji_user u, fuji_team t, fuji_group g, fuji_field f where u.user_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userName},'%') and u.user_group = g.group_id and g.group_team = t.team_id and t.team_field = f.field_id;

select u.*, g.group_name , t.team_name,f.field_name, i.* from fuji_user u, fuji_team t, fuji_group g, fuji_field f, fuji_info i where date(i.info_time) = date(now()) and i.info_user_id = u.user_id and u.user_group = g.group_id and g.group_team = t.team_id and t.team_field = f.field_id
order by i.info_time asc;

select u.*, g.group_name , t.team_name,f.field_name, i.* from fuji_user u, fuji_team t, fuji_group g, fuji_field f, fuji_info i where date(i.info_time) = #{wantDate} and i.info_user_id = u.user_id and u.user_group = g.group_id and g.group_team = t.team_id and t.team_field = f.field_id
order by i.info_time asc;

select u.*, g.group_name , t.team_name,f.field_name, i.* from fuji_user u, fuji_team t, fuji_group g, fuji_field f, fuji_info i where i.info_user_id = u.user_id and u.user_group = g.group_id and g.group_team = t.team_id and t.team_field = f.field_id and ( u.user_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchData},'%') OR g.group_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchData},'%') OR u.user_phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchData},'%') OR i.info_description LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchData},'%') )
order by i.info_time asc;
